mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (reservation_no, member_id, care_no, regdate, regtime, people) VALUES (reservation_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{careNo}, #{regdate}, #{regtime}, #{people})
mapper.select: SELECT shelterName, regdate, status, regtime, careNo, people, reservationNo, memberId, insertDate FROM (SELECT CEIL(rownum / #{pageParams.elementSize}) AS request_page, shelterName, regdate, status, regtime, careNo, people, reservationNo, memberId, insertDate FROM(SELECT n.name shelterName, a.regdate regdate, a.status status, a.regtime regtime, a.care_no careNo, a.people people, a.reservation_no reservationNo, a.member_id memberId, TO_CHAR(a.insert_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS insertDate FROM reservation a JOIN care n ON a.care_no = n.care_no ORDER BY reservationNo DESC) a WHERE memberId = #{memberId} ) a WHERE request_page = #{pageParams.requestPage}

SELECT name shelterName, regdate, status, regtime, care_no, people, reservation_no reservationNo, member_id memberId, insertDate FROM (SELECT CEIL(rownum / #{pageParams.elementSize}) AS request_page, name, regdate, status, regtime, care_no, people, reservation_no, member_id, insertDate FROM (SELECT n.name, a.regdate, a.status, a.regtime, a.care_no, a.people, a.reservation_no, a.member_id, TO_CHAR(a.insert_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') insertDate FROM reservation a JOIN care n ON a.care_no = n.care_no ORDER BY a.reservation_no DESC) a WHERE a.care_no = #{careNo} ) a WHERE request_page = #{pageParams.requestPage}

SELECT m.NAME memberName, r.RESERVATION_NO reservationNo, TO_CHAR(r.insert_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') insertDate, r.REGDATE regdate, r.REGTIME regtime, c.TEL telNum, c.NAME shelterName, r.status status, r.people people, m.tel memberPhoneNum FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON r.member_id = m.member_id JOIN CARE c ON r.care_no = c.care_no WHERE r.RESERVATION_NO = #{value}
